To business № 2-3824/19

RESOLUTION

In the name of the Russian Federation

(correspondence)

22 April 2019 year                                                 Pervomaisky district court          g. Krasnodar as part

Presidency                                          Medoevoj en Å

when Secretary                                             Nizhegorodovoj M.GN

examined in open court case on the claim JSC «alpha-Bank» to Sarkisyan M. A. for the early recovery of arrears credit agreement,

ESTABLISHED:

JSC «alpha-Bank» He appealed to the court to Sarkisyan M.A. for the early recovery of arrears credit agreement.

In support of the requirements specified, that 02.08.2017 g. Bank and Sarkisyan M.A. concluded agreement of lending to consumer credit. Dannomu agreement He was granted number №. agreement It lies in ofertno-aktseptnoj form.

in pursuance agreement lending Bank realized listing money the borrower in the amount of 130 452,94 ruble.

In accordance with the conditions agreement lending, contained in general terms of contract consumer credit № from 05.06.2014g., as well as other document, containing individual conditions credit, sum credit made 130 452,94 ruble, under 10,40% APR. loan amount shall be refunded by making monthly payment not later 3-day of each month size 6100 rubles.

Bank of its obligations He performed in full, however borrower obligations under the credit agreement executes properly, borrower repeatedly violated its obligations on voluntary repay the loan and pay interest on time and volumes, specified in loan agreement.

Platezhi loan carried out irregularly, repeatedly allowed delay of payments. To date past due accounts not repaid. borrower repeatedly delalis warning necessity proper performance they its obligations to vzyskatelem.

debt the bank for the period 04.09.2017g. on 04.12.2017g. is 133 551,90 rubles, skladyvayushhayasya of the following amounts: 129 497,44 rubles – overdue principal debt, 3121,25 rubles – accrued interest, fines and penalty 933,21 rubles.

In connection with the improper execution obligations defendant, bank forced to apply to the court this suit, concerning It asks the court to recover from the defendant the amount of arrears agreement on lending 133 551,90 ruble, to recover costs on payment of registration fee in the amount of 3871,04 ruble.

At the hearing the representative of the complainant JSC «alpha-Bank» He failed to appear, informed properly and timely, the reason for non-attendance is not the court said. The petition there is an application for examination of the case in the absence of the plaintiff.

defendant Sarkisyan M.A. at the hearing did not come, It notified appropriately and timely, the reason for non-attendance is not the court reported, to hear the case in its no not ask.

As stated in Resolution of the Plenum of the Supreme Court «Oh timing review by the courts RF criminal, civil Affairs or cases of administrative offenses» from 27.12.07 g. №52 in accordance with paragraph.1 Article. 6 Convention for the Protection of Human Rights and Fundamental Freedoms, which due h.4 Article. 15 RF Constitution part legal RF system, everyone in event of a dispute of his civil Rights and responsibilities or sight him any criminal charge is entitled to a fair and public hearing within a reasonable time by an independent and impartial tribunal established by under the law. Subject to the requirements this provision, as well as provisions n.n. «with» n.3 Article.14 The International Covenant on Civil and political Rights criminal and civil cases, as well as cases of administrative offenses should be dealt with without neopravdannoj delays in the strict compliance with the rules proceedings, important component which are terms of consideration of cases. In this case, considering abovementioned circumstances giving the Court finds no grounds for deposits trial and considers it possible to consider his Available in materials.

the court which examining the case file, I came to the following.

As established by the court and should be from the case, 02.08.2017 g. Bank and Sarkisyan M.A. concluded agreement of lending to consumer credit. Dannomu agreement He was granted number                        №. agreement It lies in ofertno-aktseptnoj form.

in pursuance agreement lending Bank realized listing money the borrower in the amount of 130 452,94 ruble.

In accordance with the conditions agreement lending, contained in general terms of contract consumer credit № from 05.06.2014g., as well as other document, containing individual conditions credit, sum credit made 130 452,94 ruble, under 10,40% APR.

loan amount shall be refunded by making monthly payment not later 3-day of each month size 6100 rubles.

According to the calculation of debt and help consumer credit, sum of indebtedness before the borrower Bank for the period 04.09.2017g. on 04.12.2017g. is 133 551,90 rubles, skladyvayushhayasya of the following amounts: 129 497,44 rubles – overdue principal debt, 3121,25 rubles – accrued interest, fines and penalty 933,21 rubles.

since the defendant voluntarily fulfills its obligations loan repayment, bank forced to go to court.

According to Article. 420, 421, 423, 432, 425 The Civil Code contract is an agreement two or more persons on establishing, modification or termination of civil rights and responsibilities. Citizens and legal entities are free to conclusion of the contract.

A contract is concluded, if the parties, to be required in cases form reached agreement on all essential terms of the contract. agreement It comes into force and becomes binding on the parties from the moment its conclusion.

According to Article. 309 Of the Civil Code obligations must be fulfilled appropriately in accordance with the the obligations and requirements of the law. Unilateral termination of commitments and unilateral change in the terms and conditions not allowed, for cases provided by law (Article. 310 of the Civil Code).

According to the h. 1 Article. 819 Civil Code of the Russian Federation on a credit agreement bank or other credit organization (lender) undertake to deliver cash (credit) the borrower in the amount and conditions provided for by agreement, and the borrower agrees to repay the the amount and pay interest on her.

part 1 Article. 810 Of the Civil Code provides, that the borrower is obliged to return Lender the loan amount received in time and order, provided that the loan agreement.

By h. 1 Article. 811 of the Civil Code, unless otherwise provided by law or loan agreement, in cases, when the borrower does not return to period of the loan amount, this amount shall be payable interest at the rate, provided for in clause 1 articles 395 this Code, from the date of, when it should have been returned, until the day of its return to the lender irrespective of the payment of interest, provided for in paragraph 1 articles 809 this Code.

Taking into account the above, and in accordance provisions loan agreement, the bank when the right demand early performance of obligations under the credit agreement.

Thus it is with the borrower should recover the amount of arrears agreement on lending № from 02.08.2017g. at the rate of 133 551,90 rubles, skladyvayushhayasya of the following amounts: 129 497,44 rubles – overdue principal debt, 3121,25 rubles – accrued interest, fines and penalty 933,21 rubles.

That is the conclusion the court reached more and therefore, that the parties agreement on lending, in which bank its obligations He performed in full volume, and the defendant to perform its obligations evades. To date, debt under the agreement are not repaid, else the court did not proven.

In accordance with Article. 98 GIC RF side, in whose favor the decision court, Court awards to compensate the other All the parties in the case incurred legal expenses.

In accordance with Article. 88 Code of Civil Procedure , court fees consist of RF of the state fee and the costs, of the proceedings.

Thus it is shall be met and the requirement to recover from the defendant of expenses incurred plaintiff to pay the state fee in the amount of 3871,04 ruble, as evidenced by the case materials.

Assessing the evidence together on business, Court concluded claim JSC «alpha-Bank» to satisfy, because they are reasonable and proven.

By virtue of Article. 56 Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation , each side must of proving the facts, to which it refers as the based on their requirements and objections, unless otherwise provided by federal law.

According to the h.2 Article. 195 RF CPC Court this decision was based only on the evidence, which were investigated in court session.

According to Article. 67 GIC RF court evaluates the evidence on their inner conviction, based on a comprehensive, full, objective and direct research available evidence in the case. No evidence has to Court predetermined force. The Court assesses the relevance, allowability, reliability of each evidence separately, as well as the sufficiency and mutual Feedback evidence in their entirety.

Based on the above, guided by Article.Article. 194-198 Code of Civil Procedure of the Russian Federation, court

R E W & L:

claim JSC «alpha-Bank» to satisfy.

collect from Sarkisyan M. A. in favor JSC «alpha-Bank» arrears of agreement on lending № from 02.08.2017g. at the rate of 133 551,90 rubles, expenses for payment of the fee at the rate of 3 871,04 ruble.

The decision can be appealed to the the Court of Appeal by District Court within a month from the date of manufacturing solutions final form by filing appeal complaints which defendant may also sue, accepted the default judgment, application to set aside the decision for seven days the date of delivery of a copy of it solutions, if such application is filed - the decision may be appealed to the Within a month from the date of of the court to refuse to satisfaction of the statement.

referee-n

The decision is made 22.04.2019g.
